question: 曜日
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>weekday</kanji> <kanji>day</kanji> is the <vocabulary>day of the week</vocabulary>, as in "Monday" or "Tuesday." You'll be learning those on level 18, but first you should learn <ja>曜日</ja> to get you prepared.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This word uses the on'yomi reading for <ja>曜</ja> and the kun'yomi reading for <ja>日</ja>. You've learned both of these already, but be careful because <ja>ひ</ja> of <ja>日</ja> changes to <ja>び</ja> here.
